import React from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import { ALL_AUTHORS, ALL_BOOKS } from '../querys' const Authors = (props) => { const author_result = useQuery(ALL_AUTHORS) const authors = author_result.data ? author_result.data.allAuthors : [] const book_result = useQuery(ALL_AUTHORS) const books = book_result.data ? book_result.data.allAuthors : [] if (!props.show) { return null } return (

authors

{authors.map(a => )}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}
) } export default Authors
